entry.summary: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AKST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. entry.title: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 27 at 11:57AM CST until January 28 at 9:00AM CST by NWS
entry.summary: ...Dangerous Cold Returns Thursday Night into Friday Morning... .A cold front will move across the area tonight with bitter cold air returning.
